attributes.action: investigate the abuse of the benefit system, in particular by the growing number of radical muslims who are demonstrating against our armed forces on their return from overseas action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as British citizens feel let down by the lack of action taken against these abusive protesters who are using our open democratic system to plot against us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
